string.value: Now that you know what's written in the letter… what should you do? You'd better go to #b#m140000000##k and talk to #b#p1201000##k.

#p1201000# says that it's essential to warn #m130000000# about the Seal Stone and writes a letter urging them to protect it at all cost. Your job is to go to #b#m130000000##k and hand the letter to the Queen, but with that annoying strategist of the Queen, Neinheart, blocking the way, it might be difficult. Maybe you should just talk to the #bStrategist#k instead.
You met the Queen's strategist, #p1101002#. He took the letter and told you he'd take it into consideration, but his eyes tell you otherwise.

If the Seal Stone is there, then that means the #rBlack Wings are on their way to #m130000000##k. I know that it's a land governed by the Empress, but…I'm not very familiar with the Cygnus Knights, and I have a feeling they may not be enough. Aran, please go save them!

I have enclosed the information about the Seal Stone along with a letter as evidence. This will make believers even out of the #bresidents of #m130000000##k. #bPlease find a way to convince them to protect the Seal Stone#k.

I don't know who the Empress is, and I don't know who the knights are, but I do know this is a pivotal moment and we do not have much time. You must head to #m130000000# and warn them of the dangers of the Black Wings.
You still haven't gone to #m130000000#? Please head to #m130000000# and deliver the letter. You never know when the Black Wings will strike.
What is going on here? I told you explicitly not to come here unless you want to become a knight… Seroiusly, this world is full of people that never listen.

What? You lost the letter I gave you? Aran, I can't believe you made a mistake like that. Sigh… It won't be a huge problem since no one will be able to identify it, because it's written in such a complex manner, but please don't lose it again. I'll write you another one, but only this once.
